snippet: Next year, New York magazine will be printed every other week as it shifts resources to support its growing website.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column evaluates history and future of New York magazine, which will reduce publication to every other week as it shifts resources to Web site; holds magazine was at the vanguard of Manhattan publishing for almost five decades, but has been forced to join other publications in acknowledging the declining profitability of print media.
lead_paragraph: Next year, New York magazine will be printed every other week as it shifts resources to support its growing website.

headline.print_headline: Long on Cutting Edge of Print, New York Magazine Cuts Back
headline.main: Long on Cutting Edge of Print, New York Magazine Cuts Back
